message.name: ERR_XRV_PRODUCT_INVALID
message.locale: The product snapshot must be related to a valid product.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SNAPSHOT_INVALID
message.locale: The sand box must be related to a valid product snapshot.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE_SANDBOX_RECORD
message.locale: A sand box already exists for the product, %1s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_USERNAME_INVALID
message.locale: The update must be related to a valid user.

message.name: ERR_FV_SNAPSHOT_DATA_WELL_FORMED
message.locale: The snapshot data must be well formed XML.

message.name: ERR_FV_SNAPSHOT_DATA_INVALID_ROOT
message.locale: The snapshot data must have a valid root element.

message.name: ERR_FV_SNAPSHOT_DATA_NO_PRODUCT
message.locale: The snapshot data requires that there is a related product.

message.name: ERR_FV_SNAPSHOT_DATA_MANY_PRODUCTS
message.locale: The snapshot data requires that there is only one related product.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SNAPSHOT_DATA_NO_SUCH_PRODUCT
message.locale: The product used to create this record no longer exists.

message.name: ERR_FV_REMOVE_DECISION_DISP_CAT_WITH_CHILD
message.locale: All related Product Period Display Categories must be removed before this Decision Display Category can be removed.

message.name: ERR_FV_REMOVE_PRODUCT_PERIOD_WITH_CHILD
message.locale: All related Product Period Display Categories must be removed before this Product Period can be removed.

message.name: ERR_FV_REMOVE_RULE_CLASS_LINK_WITH_CHILD
message.locale: All references to this rule class must be removed before this rule class can be removed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PRODUCT_PERIOD_OVERLAPS
message.locale: Product period %1s, overlaps with another product period on product %2c.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_SUCH_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: Rule class %1s, on product %2c, no longer exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_SUCH_RULE_SET
message.locale: The rule set containing %1s, on product %2c, no longer exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ABSTRACT_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: %1c rule class %2s on product, %3c, is declared abstract.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RULE_CLASS_CONTAINS_INITIALIZATION_ARGUMENTS
message.locale: %1c rule class %2s on product, %3c, contains initialization arguments.
%1c rule class %2s on product, %3c, contains initialisation arguments.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RULE_CLASS_INVALID
message.locale: Rule class %1s, on product %2c, is not a valid %3c rule class.

message.name: ERR_FV_SNAPSHOT_DATA_EMPTY
message.locale: Snapshot XML must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: User must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTION_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Update Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ACTION_DATE_TIME_EMPTY
message.locale: Update Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUCCESSION_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: Succession Number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_RV_EDIT_REMOVAL
message.locale: A sand box product of update type 'Removed' cannot be edited.

message.name: ERR_PUBLISH_CONFLICT
message.locale: This product has been updated by another user. If you wish to overwrite their changes tick the Force Publication check box.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PUBLICATION_DUPLICATE
message.locale: Publications to one live product must be performed one at a time.

message.name: INF_PRODUCT_PERIOD_DATE_RANGE
message.locale: %1d to %2d

message.name: INF_PRODUCT_PERIOD_SUMMARY
message.locale: %1s: %2d to %3d

message.name: ERR_FV_REAPPLY_NO_PRODUCT
message.locale: The live product must be selected.

message.name: ERR_FV_REAPPLY_NO_SNAPSHOT
message.locale: The snapshot to reapply must be selected.

message.name: INF_ACTION_DESCRIPTION_PENDING
message.locale: %1s (Pending publication)

message.name: ERR_FV_ALREADY_QUEUED_FOR_PUBLICATION
message.locale: This change is already queued for publication.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_EDIT
message.locale: This change is queued for publication and cannot be edited.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_DISCARD
message.locale: This change is queued for publication and cannot be discarded.
